AI Description: pugixml is a lightweight C++ XML processing library that consists of a simple and intuitive API. It is designed to be easy to integrate with other projects and provides efficient and fast XML parsing capabilities.
Core Features: Some of the core features of pugixml include XPath support, DOM-like interface, memory efficiency, high performance parsing, and compatibility with various C++ compilers.
General Tags: Xml Processing, C++ Library, Xpath, Parsing
